snippet.title: Precipice Trailer
snippet.description:
PRECIPICE™, a 1-2 player game of atomic age brinksmanship is coming early 2019 for PC, Mac and Linux.

Safeguard your closest allies and change unfavorable regimes without giving away your long-term ambitions. Every action risks an enemy reprisal, and if nobody backs down from a standoff, we all lose.

For more information, visit: http://www.littlereddoggames.com/precipice

Song is Blow Up by NEFFEX.  Please support these guys, they're wonderful people.  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBefBxNTPoNCQBU_Lta6Nvg

(C) 2018 LRDGames Inc. LLC
